lemma encode_problem_parallel_complete_i: fixes \<Pi>::"'a strips_problem" assumes "is_valid_problem_strips \<Pi>" and "(\<Pi>)\<^sub>G \<subseteq>\<^sub>m execute_parallel_plan ((\<Pi>)\<^sub>I) \<pi>" "\<forall>v k. k < length (trace_parallel_plan_strips ((\<Pi>)\<^sub>I) \<pi>) \<longrightarrow> (\<A> (State k (index (strips_problem.variables_of \<Pi>) v)) \<longleftrightarrow> (trace_parallel_plan_strips ((\<Pi>)\<^sub>I) \<pi> ! k) v = Some True) \<and> (\<not>\<A> (State k (index (strips_problem.variables_of \<Pi>) v)) \<longleftrightarrow> ((trace_parallel_plan_strips ((\<Pi>)\<^sub>I) \<pi> ! k) v \<noteq> Some True))" shows "\<A> \<Turnstile> \<Phi>\<^sub>I \<Pi>"
